channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Conclave From The Vatican
channel.desc: (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Joyful Mysteries of the Annunciation, Visitation, Nativity, Presentation and Finding and its graces and virtues. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Le Chapelet De La Divine Misericorde
channel.desc: The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy is prayed in French by the parish of Our Lady of the Nativity in La Garde, France. Our Lord taught Sister Faustina in Poland, the five decades to recite. Spoken and sung with portrayals of Jesus' Passion and Resurrection. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford develops this talk around our names and what we do to identify ourselves to others. He shows various ways St. John the Evangelist is known and goes on to say that we are the masters of our own fate in how we are known to the world. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Catholics Come Home
channel.desc: Steve Venable?s encounters with scandalous and non-traditional ideologies within different Protestant faiths led him to pray and search for the Truth found within the Catholic Faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother guides her viewers on how to counter pride with charity and justice. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fatima A Living Faith
channel.desc: An EWTN original docu-drama on the apparitions of Our Lady of Fatima and the meaning of each message she gave to the three shepherd children. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Christianity has existed in India for 2,000 years, but growing support for a nationalist ideology called Hindutva makes it harder for minority religions to practice their faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! The Choices We Face
channel.desc: Scripture scholar and professor at Sacred Heart Major Seminary, Dr. Mary Healy discusses the Second Vatican Council, the development of doctrine, and charismatic spirituality. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Classics: Mother Angelica Presents
channel.desc: Mother discusses living Christianity. She cites St. Paul as a perfect example despite having many good excuses not to be a Christian but he was anyway. She also talks about how the Lord often asks us to do the ridiculous and how afraid we are to do so. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: Susan Conroy looks at the profound holiness of Blessed Mother Teresa of Calcutta and what we can learn from it. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: Dr. Ray interviews two men who are leaders in faith, family and business. Joe Hamrock and Jeff Schiefelbein share insights into navigating today?s complex and challenging world. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: Southern Author and devout Catholic Flannery O?Connor reenacts a scene from her famous story, ?A Good Man is Hard to Find,? with Dr. Benjamin Wiker to demonstrate how God uses imperfect people as mediums for His grace. Part 1 of 2. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Savoring Our Faith
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Patalinghug prepares three alternative burgers while explaining that competition is good as long as we all keep our eye on our ultimate goal- that of heaven. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Dominican Sisters Of Mary, Mother Of The Eucharist
channel.desc: Fr. Nick Monco describes the ways in which to defeat despair and how shame can also either draw us closer to conversion or prevent us from obtaining it. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of Saint Joseph
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this inspirational litany asking for the prayers of Saint Joseph from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: Follow the amazing faith journey of Jamie Jensen. Diagnosed with cerebral palsy at birth, this quadriplegic has been to Lourdes 17 times despite being confined to a wheelchair. Learn about the gift of faith he received. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Archbishop Sheen tells you how to overcome compulsive habits that lead us away from God and replace them with new ones that lead us to Him. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: A Force For Good
channel.desc: A business profile on the Mischel Family and their business Electric Mirror; The Catholic University of America?s Anthony Cannizzaro and Max Torres talk about modern Christian businesses; communism and the early church, and more. Hosted by Jay Richards. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about the Mass as sacrificial worship that Christ commanded, papal infallibility, and Christ?s sacrifice as a model for a sacrificial Christian life. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina explore the meaning of Jesus? saying ?the Kingdom of God is at hand.?. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Truth In The Heart
channel.desc: Sr. Mary Joseph goes over three points of how to receive Holy Communion: posture, the chief effects of worthy reception and thanksgiving. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Catholic Family
channel.desc: Thomas and his wife Helen teach their children about St. Maximilian Kolbe, his sacrifice unto death, his love for the Virgin Mary, and his zeal for souls. Animated. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Great Books Every Catholic Should Know
channel.desc: Works covered by Joseph Pearce are ?The Waste Land,? a poem by T.S. Eliot, ?Kristin Lavransdatter,? a trilogy written by Sigrid Undset, and ?C,? a novel by Maurice Baring. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Adoration And Reparation
channel.desc: A special presentation of the Chaplet of Adoration and Reparation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Bookmark
channel.desc: Host Doug Keck talks with Mosongo Osong and Celina Mary Okpaleke about the Marian consecration for families and kids - a 33-day preparation for consecration to Jesus through Mary. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Spirit Of Catholic Leadership
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer examines the ways leaders can incorporate spontaneous prayers into their daily life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Setting Captives Free: A Deeper Look At Ignatian Discernment Of Spirits
channel.desc: Fr. Gallagher explains how St. Ignatius? rules for discernment help Catholics interpret the feelings of consolation and spiritual desolation they will experience when contemplating a spiritual life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass each Sunday from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel as friars intone Gregorian chant. Visiting clergy concelebrate this sacrament. LIVE Sundays at 8 am Eastern. (80 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Sacred Heart Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they pray the Litany of the Sacred Heart. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Praying As A Family
channel.desc: Family members share memorable moments in their lives that formed them as individuals, and how parents play a vital role in shaping their children's hearts and minds. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Best With Fr. Groeschel
channel.desc: To explain the importance of devotion to Mary, Fr. Groeschel uses the Scriptures to discuss the Annunciation, and our acceptance of Jesus as Divine and as the Messiah, and Mary as the Mother of God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live With Passion With Father Cedric
channel.desc: Fr. Cedric examines what it means for God to keep us, how it connects to human sufferings, diseases, toxic people, and ultimately our salvation even through death. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Cross Training
channel.desc: Though equal in dignity, men and women are individually unique. Fr. James Mallon addresses the exercise tips, advice and book recommendations for both sexes' nutritional needs. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fatima A Living Faith
channel.desc: An EWTN original docu-drama on the apparitions of Our Lady of Fatima and the meaning of each message she gave to the three shepherd children. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Holy Rosary From Lourdes
channel.desc: From Lourdes, France. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Sunday Mass From Lourdes
channel.desc: (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Le Chapelet De La Divine Misericorde
channel.desc: The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy is prayed in French by the parish of Our Lady of the Nativity in La Garde, France. Our Lord taught Sister Faustina in Poland, the five decades to recite. Spoken and sung with portrayals of Jesus' Passion and Resurrection. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: In Matthew's Gospel, Jesus talks about the Kingdom of God being a banquet prepared by the king with all invited. When it was time to dine, many refused for various reasons. All of this was important to the Jews of that time and also to our generation. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass each Sunday from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel as friars intone Gregorian chant. Visiting clergy concelebrate this sacrament. LIVE Sundays at 8 am Eastern. (80 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Sacred Heart Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they pray the Litany of the Sacred Heart. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer and Doug Keck answer questions about the Faith, honing in on the distractions of bad music at the Mass and whether we will see our loved ones in Heaven. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Light That Never Fades
channel.desc: A documentary that explores the Byzantine rite and worship in Eastern Churches that are in communion with Rome. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Great Books Every Catholic Should Know
channel.desc: Works covered by Joseph Pearce are ?The Waste Land,? a poem by T.S. Eliot, ?Kristin Lavransdatter,? a trilogy written by Sigrid Undset, and ?C,? a novel by Maurice Baring. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Bookmark
channel.desc: Host Doug Keck talks with Mosongo Osong and Celina Mary Okpaleke about the Marian consecration for families and kids - a 33-day preparation for consecration to Jesus through Mary. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Secret Treasures Of The Vatican
channel.desc: For the first time in history, the Holy See has graciously permitted a large selection of historic artifacts from the Papal Treasury to travel outside the frontiers of the Vatican City State. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Church And The Poor
channel.desc: Fr. Ho Lung welcomes Archbishop Nicola Girasoli, Papal Nuncio to the Caribbean Region to talk about the Missionaries of the Poor, their way of life and their service among the poor and needy in the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: An Ewtn Holy Land Experience
channel.desc: Fr. Joseph Mary Wolfe and Fr. Mark Mary Cristina explore the Holy Family's life before Jesus embarked on his mission. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: EWTN foundress Mother Angelica takes a look at mercy, and where it comes from, where it fits into our lives, and what it means to all of us. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Sunday Vespers With Benediction
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they celebrate Vespers and Benediction of the Blessed Sacrament from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, Alabama. (35 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Best With Fr. Groeschel
channel.desc: To explain the importance of devotion to Mary, Fr. Groeschel uses the Scriptures to discuss the Annunciation, and our acceptance of Jesus as Divine and as the Messiah, and Mary as the Mother of God. (25 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: Every week, Abigail Galv?n and a team of pro-life experts shine the light of truth on abortion, euthanasia, assisted suicide, and the culture of death. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass each Sunday from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel as friars intone Gregorian chant. Visiting clergy concelebrate this sacrament. LIVE Sundays at 8 am Eastern. (80 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Sacred Heart Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they pray the Litany of the Sacred Heart. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Follow along as Father Mark and Brother John head to San Francisco to spread the pro-life message as they join in marching at the Walk for Life West Coast. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Icons
channel.desc: Today?s heartwarming episode features Brothers Kolbe, Michelangelo and Francisco, three friars on a mission. They find and deliver a much-needed wheelchair to a child whose family could never afford it. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: A Force For Good
channel.desc: How entrepreneur Gellert Dornay grew his successful home loan company, Axia Homes; Catholic University?s Max Torres explains how to apply catholic social teaching to the business world; how to save money, and more. Hosted by Jay Richards. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Sr. Briege McKenna, OSC, talks about her ministry to priests and religious and also shares her view on the state of the priesthood and religious life over the last fifty years. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: Bob and Penny Lord follow the faith journey of St. Therese of Lisieux, covering everything from her childhood, to her call to religious life, and the way of "The Little Flower.". (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Wild Goose
channel.desc: Fr. Dave Pivonka, TOR, shares how the gifts of the Holy Spirit aid personal sanctification and exist for everyone. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Marriage: For Better...forever!
channel.desc: Marriage Counsler Greg Popcak Offers practical tips for nurturing the friendship in marriage. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: Dr. Ray interviews two men who are leaders in faith, family and business. Joe Hamrock and Jeff Schiefelbein share insights into navigating today?s complex and challenging world. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Letter And Spirit
channel.desc: Dr. Scott Hahn and Mike Aquilina look at the life of Moses and the priestly people of the Book of Exodus. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Clifford explains we are no different than the Prodigal Son's older brother if we show indifference to others. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Crossing The Goal
channel.desc: Former NFL Wide-Receiver Danny Abramowicz and team talk about countering lust with fidelity in this hard-hitting look at Catholic spirituality for men. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Light That Never Fades
channel.desc: A documentary that explores the Byzantine rite and worship in Eastern Churches that are in communion with Rome. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: I Was There, The Holy Mass
channel.desc: A reverent animated account of a young man's realization of the meaning of the Mass for him. (30 minutes).
